title: Future of Work and Fitness
itunes:title: Future of Work and Fitness
description:
Sanjay Rishi, CEO of Corporate Solutions at Jones Lang Lasalle, discusses what getting back to work means for commercial real estate. He talks about what the "next normal" will look like. Rishi says that businesses will have to rethink aspects of workplace operations including air quality, maintenance, and maximum occupancy. Todd Wadler, Co-Founder and CEO of Box Union Studio, talks about how the fitness business is managing and adapting during the coronavirus outbreak. He points out that boxing can help alleviate anxiety and says that his company is continually increasing its digital offerings.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
